Surfaces¶

sportypy produces surface plots for the following sports and their corresponding leagues:

  • Baseball
    • Little League — LittleLeagueField
    • MiLB (Minor League Baseball) — MiLBField
    • MLB (Major League Baseball) — MLBField
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) — NCAAField
    • NFHS (National Federation of State High Schools) — NFHSField
    • Pony League — PonyField
  • Basketball
    • FIBA (Fédération Internationale de Basketball) — FIBACourt
    • NBA (National Basketball Association) — NBACourt
    • NBA G League — NBAGLeagueCourt
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) — NCAACourt
    • NFHS (National Federation of State High Schools) — NFHSCourt
    • WNBA (Women’s National Basketball Association) — WNBACourt
  • Curling
    • WCF (World Curling Federation) — WCFSheet
  • Football
    • CFL (Canadian Football League) — CFLField
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) — NCAAField
    • NFHS (National Federation of State High Schools) — NFHSField
    • NFL (National Football Association) — NFLField
  • Hockey
    • AHL (American Hockey League) — AHLRink
    • ECHL (East Coast Hockey League) — ECHLRink
    • IIHF (International Ice Hockey Federation) — IIHFRink
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) — NCAARink
    • NHL (National Hockey League) — NHLRink
    • NWHL (National Women’s Hockey League) — NWHLRink
    • OHL (Ontario Hockey League) — OHLRink
    • PHF (Professional Hockey Federation) — PHFRink
    • QMJHL (Quebec Major Junior Hockey League) — QMJHLRink
    • USHL (United States Hockey League) — USHLRink
  • Soccer
    • EPL (English Premier League) — EPLPitch
    • FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association) — FIFAPitch
    • MLS (Major League Soccer) — MLSPitch
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletics Association) — NCAAPitch
    • NWSL (National Women’s Soccer League) — NWSLPitch
  • Tennis
    • ATP (Association of Tennis Professionals) — ATPCourt
    • ITA (Intercollegiate Tennis Association) — ITACourt
    • ITF (International Tennis Federation) — ITFCourt
    • NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) — NCAACourt
    • USTA (United States Tennis Association) — USTACourt
    • WTA (World Tennis Association) — WTACourt

sportypy
